org.ivar.leveltools.DameLevel

type
class
extends
Level

Static Methods

public loadLevel(xmlString : String, ?assetsPath : String, ?addToScene : Bool, ?tilemapAddCallback : TilemapAddCallback, ?objectAddCallback : ObjectAddCallback, ?linkAddCallback : LinkAddCallback) : DameLevel

Loads a level from a xml string using the specified asset path.
Parameters:
xmlString - the xml exported from DAME.
assetsPath - Path to the assets directory from the project's root dir (usually the one containing the .nmml file).
addToScene - if this is true, the level will be added to the current state as soon as the level is loaded.
tilemapAddCallback - a callback that is called every time a tilemap is loaded.
objectAddCallback - a callback that is called every time an object (sprite) is loaded.
linkAddCallback - a callback that is called every time a link is loaded.
Returns:
a populated instance of DameLevel.

Constructor

public new(assetsPath : String, tilemapAddCallback : TilemapAddCallback, objectAddCallback : ObjectAddCallback, linkAddCallback : LinkAddCallback)
Constructs the object, initializes members and callbacks but doesn't actually load the level.
Parameters:
assetsPath - Path to the assets directory from the project's root dir (usually the one containing the .nmml file).
tilemapAddCallback - a callback that is called every time a tilemap is loaded.
objectAddCallback - a callback that is called every time an object (sprite) is loaded.
linkAddCallback - a callback that is called every time a link is loaded.

inherited from org.ivar.leveltools.Level
Path to the assets directory.

private layers : Hash<org.flixel.FlxGroup>

inherited from org.ivar.leveltools.Level
A table that contains all the layers regardless of type, by the name of the layer.

private linkAddCallback : LinkAddCallback

A callback that is called whenever a link is loaded.

private linkIds : Hash<org.flixel.FlxSprite>

A table of registered link IDs used to link sprites.

private masterLayer : org.flixel.FlxGroup

inherited from org.ivar.leveltools.Level
The group that contains all other groups.

private name : String

inherited from org.ivar.leveltools.Level
Name of the level.

private objectAddCallback : ObjectAddCallback

inherited from org.ivar.leveltools.Level
A callback that is called whenever an object is loaded.

private paths : Hash<org.flixel.FlxPath>

A table of parsed paths, stored by name.

private tilemapAddCallback : TilemapAddCallback

inherited from org.ivar.leveltools.Level
A callback that is called whenever a tilemap is loaded.

private tilemaps : Hash<org.flixel.FlxTilemap>

inherited from org.ivar.leveltools.Level
A table that contains the loaded tilemaps stored by name of the layer.

inherited from org.ivar.leveltools.Level

public getPath(name : String) : org.flixel.FlxPath

Returns a path with the specified name.
Parameters:
name - name of the path.
Returns:
a FlxPath instance if the path is found, null otherwise.

private parseLayer(layerNode : haxe.xml.Fast) : Void

Loads a single layer and adds it to the master layer.
Parameters:
layerNode - the node that contains the layer
Returns:
Nothing.

private parseLevel(addToScene : Bool, xml : haxe.xml.Fast) : Void

Parses a level from a loaded xml file.
Parameters:
addToScene - if this is true, the level will be added to the current state as soon as the level is loaded.
xml - the loaded xml file containing the level to be loaded.
Returns:
Nothing.

private parseLinks(linkNode : haxe.xml.Fast) : Void

Loads a link and calls the LinkAddCallback, passing the two linked sprites and the properties of the link. If the sprites the link references do not exist, the link is simply skipped.
Parameters:
linkNode - The node that contains link data
Returns:
Nothing.

private parsePath(group : org.flixel.FlxGroup, pathNode : haxe.xml.Fast, layerNode : haxe.xml.Fast) : Void

Loads a path and adds it to the paths table under the name of the layer. Currently, only one path per layer is supported, until I find a better way to do this.
Parameters:
group - The group of the layer this path belongs to.
pathNode - The node that contains path data
layerNode - The node that contains layer data
Returns:
Nothing.
Todo:
Find a way around the path naming issue

private parseSprite(group : org.flixel.FlxGroup, spriteNode : haxe.xml.Fast, layerNode : haxe.xml.Fast) : Void

Loads a sprite and adds it to the layer group. The sprite is created using reflection, from the class name specified in Dame (the class name should contain the whole package). If the class doesn't exist, it is simply skipped. If the objectAddCallback is specified, it is called with the loaded sprite and it's properties as arguments.
Parameters:
group - The group of the layer this sprite belongs to.
spriteNode - The node that contains sprite data
layerNode - The node that contains layer data
Returns:
Nothing.
Todo:
Maybe throw an exception when the sprite doesn't exist?

private parseTilemap(group : org.flixel.FlxGroup, mapNode : haxe.xml.Fast, layerNode : haxe.xml.Fast) : Void

Loads a tilemap and adds it to the layer group. If specified, the tilemapAddCallback is called with the loaded tilemap as argument.
Parameters:
group - The group of the layer this map belongs to
mapNode - The node that contains tilemap data
layerNode - The node that contains layer data
Returns:
Nothing.
